details.title: Food and Friends
details.description:
Seniors (55+) are invited to participate in a monthly virtual luncheon.

Join us and guest speakers as we create a safe space to socialize and learn. 

Presentations are on Zoom.

details.title: Medwatch Program
details.description:
Get your vital medical information and health care wishes to emergency responders and physicians in emergency situations. We work in partnership with Langley Division of Family Practice to help seniors complete their MedWatch forms and document Advance Care Planning wishes. 
Call us to arrange for a volunteer visit one on one.

details.title: BC211
details.description:
Community Resource Guide.
 Local community resource guide for Langley seniors. Looking for a phone number or link? Try checking here first!
 bc211.ca is a nonprofit organization that specializes in providing information and referral regarding community, government and social services in BC.

details.title: Healthy Living Bags
details.description:
Providing fresh fruit & vegetables
The Healthy Living Bag contains a variety of fresh fruit and vegetables.
Delivered or Pickup on the 1st Tuesday of every month. 

Order Deadline: the Thursday prior to delivery

details.title: Home From the Hospital
details.description: We also provide meals for those at-risk who are coming home after a stay at our local hospital. This program provides 5 days of free meal delivery, along with the watchful eye of our caring volunteers.

details.title: Together we deliver more than just meals!
